## Key Concepts

- Medallion Architecture: Bronze → Silver → Gold → Platinum
- Spec-Kit: constitution.md + prd.md + plan.md + tasks.md
- OCA Compliance: AGPL-3 + proper structure + tests
- TBWA Branding: #F1C100 (yellow) + #000000 (black)
- Finance PPM: BIR calendar + Clarity PPM parity + ECharts

## Quality Gates

Before commit:
1. ./scripts/verify.sh
2. ./scripts/repo_health.sh
3. ./scripts/spec_validate.sh

CI enforces:
- Python syntax
- Formatting (black, isort)
- Module install tests
- Spec validation
- Docker build

## Stack

- Odoo: CE 18.0 + OCA modules
- Frontend: Next.js 14 + Fluent UI v9
- Database: PostgreSQL 15
- Automation: n8n + Mattermost
- Hosting: DigitalOcean
- Storage: Supabase (external)

## Agent Commands

- /project:plan: Create implementation plan
- /project:implement: Execute plan
- /project:verify: Run verification
- /project:ship: Full workflow
